{"role": "assistant", "content": "Okay, the `todo.md` is updated.

Now, let's look at the next steps from our plan:

```
## Project Setup
- [x] Initialize a new Next.js 14 project with App Router
- [ ] Install dependencies (Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Supabase)
- [ ] Set up basic project structure (pages, components, styles)
```

The next task is to install the remaining dependencies: Framer Motion and Supabase. Since Tailwind CSS was installed as part of `create-next-app`, we just need to add these two.

## Installing Dependencies

I'll run the npm install command within our `code-muse` project directory.

<execute-command folder="code-muse">
npm install framer-motion @supabase/supabase-js
</execute-command>", "tool_calls": null}
